I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night,'' Zahi Hawass , chairperson of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said. He added looters had also ransacked the ticket office. Death toll in Egypt's protests hits 74 At least 74 people have been killed in protests across Egypt calling for an end

regime van president Mubarak kwamen toen net op gang. Het museum ligt vlakbij het Tahrirplein, het centrum van de demonstraties. ''Ze zochten naar twee dingen'', zegt Zahi Hawass , goud en rood kwikzilver. Volgens de legende kun je daar mensen mee vermoorden of zelfs djins mee oproepen. Het is natuurlijk niet waar, maar ze denken dat het in de kelen van mummies verstopt zit. Donker De plunderaars sloegen dertien vitrines stuk en beschadigden enkele objecten, maar er werd niets gestolen. has joined the Defending Social Security Caucus newly organized by fellow Democratic Sen. Bernie Sanders of Vermont. ''Social Security has not contributed a dime to the debt or the deficit,'' he said, calling the program rock-solid for at least another 27 years. That was a reference to the moment when Social Security's trustees project that the system's trust fund-- financed by payroll taxes that are segregated from other federal levies-- will run out.

an occupying power. Paul Bremer 's decision to disband the Iraqi army flooded the streets with angry, jobless young men, some of whom would later join the insurgency.
